definitions.title: pron. 1 pl. comm. we
definitions.body: (the pl. corresp. to [[אָנׁכִי]], as [[אֲנוּ]]; to [[אֲנִי]]; v. W:SG p. 100; Ph. [[אנחן]] CIS:i. 3, 16.17, Aram. [[אֲנַׇחְנׇא]], Targum also [[נַחְנׇא]], Syr. 0anah.nan, h.nan, nah.nu, nh.h:) Ge 13:8, Ge 29:4, Ge 37:7, Ge 42:11, Ge 42:13, Nu 9:7, De 1:28, De 1:41, Joe 2:17, Joe 2:18, etc. Like [[אֲנִי]], following a ptcp. as its subj. Ge 19:13, Nu 10:29, Ju Jdg 19:18, 2Ki 18:26; appended to a vb, for emph. Ju Jdg 9:28, 2Ki 10:4, Is 20:6.
